LanguageData.Cassowary.label: казуар
LanguageData.Cassowary.description: A large flightless bird with brightly-colored feathers. While it looks beautiful, its kick is vicious. It's known for being quick to aggression when harmed by violence or confronted by incompetent animal tamers.
LanguageData.Cassowary.tools.0.label: кігті
LanguageData.Cassowary.tools.1.label: дзьоб
LanguageData.Cassowary.tools.2.label: голова
LanguageData.Cassowary_Leather.label: cassowary leather
LanguageData.Cassowary_Meat.label: bird meat
LanguageData.Cassowary_Corpse.label: cassowary corpse
LanguageData.Emu.label: ему
LanguageData.Emu.description: A large flightless bird with beady eyes on its ugly face. With its bad attitude, it is the jerk of the natural world. Bother it, and it is guaranteed to seek revenge.
LanguageData.Emu.tools.0.label: кігті
LanguageData.Emu.tools.1.label: дзьоб
LanguageData.Emu.tools.2.label: голова
LanguageData.Emu_Leather.label: emu leather
LanguageData.Emu_Corpse.label: emu corpse
LanguageData.Ostrich.label: страус
LanguageData.Ostrich.description: The largest unmodified bird species, ostriches are known for their fast run, huge eggs, and powerful kick. It is easily angered.
LanguageData.Ostrich.tools.0.label: кігті
LanguageData.Ostrich.tools.1.label: дзьоб
LanguageData.Ostrich.tools.2.label: голова
LanguageData.Ostrich_Leather.label: ostrich leather
LanguageData.Ostrich_Corpse.label: ostrich corpse
LanguageData.Turkey.label: індик
LanguageData.Turkey.description: A short, fat, flightless bird known for its hilarious 'gobbling' call. It has been long domesticated, but also lives in the wild.
LanguageData.Turkey.tools.0.label: кігті
LanguageData.Turkey.tools.1.label: дзьоб
LanguageData.Turkey.tools.2.label: голова
LanguageData.Turkey_Leather.label: turkey leather
LanguageData.Turkey_Meat.label: turkey meat
LanguageData.Turkey_Corpse.label: turkey corpse
